cofh.api.item

Interface IMultiModeItem


  • public interface IMultiModeItem
    Implement this interface on Item classes which may be "Empowered" - what that means is completely up to you. This just provides a uniform way of dealing with them.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean decrMode(ItemStack stack)
      Decrement the current mode of an item.
      int getMode(ItemStack stack)
      Get the current mode of an item.
      int getNumModes(ItemStack stack)
      Returns the number of possible modes.
      boolean incrMode(ItemStack stack)
      Increment the current mode of an item.
      void onModeChange(EntityPlayer player, ItemStack stack)
      Callback method for reacting to a state change.
      boolean setMode(ItemStack stack, int mode)
      Attempt to set the empowered state of the item.

    • Method Detail

      • getMode

        int getMode(ItemStack stack)
        Get the current mode of an item.

      • setMode

        boolean setMode(ItemStack stack,
              int mode)
        Attempt to set the empowered state of the item.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack to set the mode on.
        mode - Desired mode.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the operation was successful, FALSE if it was not.

      • incrMode

        boolean incrMode(ItemStack stack)
        Increment the current mode of an item.

      • decrMode

        boolean decrMode(ItemStack stack)
        Decrement the current mode of an item.

      • getNumModes

        int getNumModes(ItemStack stack)
        Returns the number of possible modes.

      • onModeChange

        void onModeChange(EntityPlayer player,
                ItemStack stack)
        Callback method for reacting to a state change. Useful in KeyBinding handlers.
        Parameters:
        player - Player holding the item, if applicable.
        stack - The item being held.
